message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's worth a lot to me, but I'm confident it will be even more valuable to you. I'm starting with a price of $1,150,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,000,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but I'm still confident this product holds more value than $1,000,000.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $1,050,000.  It's a fair compromise, considering the product's true worth.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I still think $1,050,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $950,000. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.
